original_text: So Hezekiah gave Sennacherib all the silver that was stored in the Lord's temple and in the palace.
korean_text: 히스기야가 이에 여호와의 성전과 왕궁 곳간에 있는 은을 다 주었고

sentences.original_text: So Hezekiah gave Sennacherib all the silver
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 히스기야는 산헤립에게 모든 은을 주었다

sentences.original_text: that was stored in the Lord's temple
